title: Just a thought and a question

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body:
New ranked players have the same MMR as (low) silver players. That way, the ones that are good and have stayed away from ranked while they tuned their skill don't have to claw their way out of bronze off the get-go. 

It happened to me a couple of games ago in one of my series as well, but luckily it doesn't happen too much.
